page.title: 07Clubs and societies
page.content: For a fairly small village there are a lot of clubs and societies in White Notley. It is not possible to record them all here but many of them are based in the Village Hall. There are several sporting clubs including Table Tennis, Badminton and Football. The Youth Football club recently closed down because of a shortage of players. The main Football Club is very successful and has built a very good new pavilion and changing rooms over the past two years. Other groups include the Women's Institute, the Mothers Union and the 301 Club. Most of these groups meet each month and have guest speakers to talk to them about a variety of different subjects. Representatives of these groups come together as the Village Hall committee.
